pageContext.claim: “I terminated one of the most ridiculous regulations of all, the last administration’s disastrous Waters of the United States rule. …That was the rule that basically took your property away from you. I will never forget at the White House signing I had. Probably 30-35 people …People that haven’t cried in many years. Some of them were so tough they never cried, they didn't cry when they were babies, and they were crying. We gave them their life back.”
pageContext.analysis: Video of the signing ceremony shows that no one is crying.
